title: Phase 1: Project Setup & Basic Infrastructure
description:
Initialize the project structure, dependencies, and foundational utilities for both server and client applications.

## Scope
- Project directory structure (server/, client/, shared/, scripts/, docs/)
- Package initialization with all dependencies
- Shared protocol definitions (message types, error codes)
- Configuration and logging infrastructure
- Environment variable templates

## Success Criteria
- `npm install` succeeds in both server/ and client/
- Logger utility works with configurable log levels
- Protocol constants exported and usable
- Configuration loaders validate and provide defaults

## Parallelization
After task 1.1, tasks 1.2-1.5 and 1.8 can run in parallel.
Task 1.6 requires 1.2 and 1.3.
Task 1.7 requires 1.5 and 1.6.
